title: Best of The Program | Guests: Josh Rogin & Rep. Lauren Boebert | 8/31/21
description:
The Biden administration will lie about small matters, so what big matters will it also lie about? Author and columnist Josh Rogin joins to discuss China's interest in Afghanistan and America not doing everything it could to save stranded Americans. Rep. Lauren Boebert joins to share the impeachment case against President Biden. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
